**2023-03-29 / @adonovan, @griesemer, @ianlancetaylor, @julieqiu, @rsc**

**Accepted**

- **crypto/sha256: add native SHA256 instruction implementation for AMD64** [#50543](https://go.dev/issue/50543)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **crypto/x509: support code-constrained roots** [#57178](https://go.dev/issue/57178)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **x/net/http2: add IdleConnTimeout to http2.Transport** [#57893](https://go.dev/issue/57893)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **cmd/compile: ability to export functions as WASM exports** [#58584](https://go.dev/issue/58584)
  - duplicate of #42372
- **context: implement NewContext and FromContext with generics** [#57025](https://go.dev/issue/57025)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **dev.boringcrypto: use boringcrypto for HKDF in x/crypto/hkdf** [#47234](https://go.dev/issue/47234)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **encoding/json: allow skipping field by returning an error in \`MarshalJSON() (\[]byte, error)\`** [#57554](https://go.dev/issue/57554)
  - duplicate of #50480
- **flag: Add IgnoreOnError ErrorHandling** [#58839](https://go.dev/issue/58839)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **runtime: add a function to install a global go-routine panic handler** [#55038](https://go.dev/issue/55038)
  - duplicate of #32333
- **slices: add difference function** [#58730](https://go.dev/issue/58730)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **testing: flag to not truncate file names when logging** [#55976](https://go.dev/issue/55976)
  - duplicate of #37708
- **x/pkgsite: new source meta tag** [#39559](https://go.dev/issue/39559)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **x/sync/errgroup: improve api for context values** [#39312](https://go.dev/issue/39312)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **x/tools/cmd/godoc: un-deprecate (or make pkgsite more compatible)** [#50229](https://go.dev/issue/50229)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**

**Likely Accept**

- **context: add AfterFunc** [#57928](https://go.dev/issue/57928)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **crypto/x509: add android user trusted CA folder as a possible source for certificate retrieval** [#58922](https://go.dev/issue/58922)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **go/ast, go/build/constraint: support for per-file Go versions using //go:build lines** [#59033](https://go.dev/issue/59033)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **net/http: add ErrSchemeMismatch** [#44855](https://go.dev/issue/44855)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **runtime: use WER for GOTRACEBACK=wer on Windows** [#57441](https://go.dev/issue/57441)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **slices: add DeleteFunc** [#54768](https://go.dev/issue/54768)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/oauth2: Add RFC 6749 error fields to RetrieveError** [#58125](https://go.dev/issue/58125)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **x/tools/go/types/objectpath: add Encoder type, to amortize Scope.Names** [#58668](https://go.dev/issue/58668)
  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

**Likely Decline**

- **all: remove GOARM=5** [#58686](https://go.dev/issue/58686)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
- **fmt: improve ergonomics of fmt.Print-like functions** [#57816](https://go.dev/issue/57816)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
